meanings.definition: A decorative cloth or panel hung in front of an altar.
meanings.sent1: The antependium added a touch of elegance to the altar.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, the priest carefully adjusted the antependium.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to hide behind the antependium during the service.
meanings.sent4: The antependium stood like a guardian in front of the sacred altar.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the antependium captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A decorative covering or hanging for the front of a lectern or pulpit.
meanings.sent1: The antependium on the lectern matched the church's color scheme perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The golden antependium shimmered under the church lights.
meanings.sent3: The antependium on the pulpit seemed to whisper secrets to the speaker.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed gracefully from behind the antependium, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The intricate embroidery on the antependium was a work of art.
